CLAHE.reference: Alwazzan et al. (2021). A hybrid algorithm to enhance colour retinal fundus images using a wiener filter and clahe. Journal of Digital Imaging.

SSR.reference: Wang et al. (2021). Retinal fundus image enhancement with image decomposition and visual adaptation.

MSR.reference: Sharif et al. (2024). Colour image enhancement model of retinal fundus images using multi scale retinex.

MSRCR.reference: Enhanced parameters based on fundus-specific optimization studies.

Frangi_Filter.correction_note: CORRECTED: Reduced from 500 to 15 following standard literature (Frangi et al., 1998)
Frangi_Filter.reference: Frangi, A. F., et al. (1998). Multiscale vessel enhancement filtering. MICCAI 1998.
